anxshouts.shouts.fire.description: Inhale air, exhale flame, and behold the Thu'um as inferno
anxshouts.shouts.frost.description: Your breath is winter, your Thu'um a blizzard
anxshouts.shouts.force.description: Your Voice is raw power, pushing aside anything - or anyone - who stands in your path
anxshouts.shouts.aura.description: Your Voice is not a Shout, but a whisper, revealing the life forces of any and all
anxshouts.shouts.storm.description: A Shout to the skies, a cry to the clouds, that awakens the destructive force of Minecraft's lightning
